headline: Truist Securities strengthens its biotech equity research coverage
summary: Truist Securities announced today that Danielle Brill has joined the firm as managing director, strengthening its equity research coverage in the biotechnology sector. Brill is the latest addition to Truist Securities, as the firm continues to expand its equity platform to broaden its capabilities in high-growth industries.

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook U.S. Bancorp, The Bank of New York Mellon, Truist Financial and Northern Trust
summary: U.S. Bancorp, The Bank of New York Mellon, Truist Financial and Northern Trust have been highlighted in this Industry Outlook article.
